headline: Vanguard Renewables and CenterPoint Energy to Advance Clean Energy Initiatives in Minnesota
summary: Vanguard Renewables, a leading U.S. environmental services company and producer of biomethane from organic waste, today announced its first utility offtake through a new agreement with CenterPoint Energy, a leading energy delivery company serving over 7 million customers nationwide. The agreement marks a key milestone as Vanguard Renewables scales renewable natural gas (RNG) infrastructure to help states like Minnesota meet their clean energy goals.

content.title: Vanguard Renewables and CenterPoint Energy to Advance Clean Energy Initiatives in Minnesota

The agreement marks a key milestone as Vanguard Renewables scales renewable natural gas (RNG) infrastructure to help states like Minnesota meet their clean energy goals.

thumbnail.caption: New Vanguard Renewables facility in Meeker County will convert organic waste into clean energy for CenterPoint Energyâ€™s Minnesota distribution system, supporting 930,000 customers, local jobs, and state climate goals.
